contribution_desc:
A study of an overview+detail implemenation system using a tablet for the detail view of the overview (on a larger desktop PC screen). The tablet could show 1, 2, or 4 detail views. 
"results show that using two or more split views is significantly faster than using only one detailed view. Results reveal that using 4 split views is only better than 2 split views for working on more than 2 regions of the graph."
